text: Nandao nimen shuoguo `yi bo la xin, yi sima yi, yi si ha ge, ye er gu bai he ge zhipai, dou shi youtaijiao tu, huo jidu jiao tu ma?'Ni shuo:`Nimen geng you zhishi ne? Haishi zhenzhu geng you zhishi ne? Ziji shouzhong you cong zhenzhu jiang shi de zhengju, er jiayi yinhui de ren, you shui bi ta hai buyi ne? Zhenzhu jue bu hushi nimen de xingwei.'
